comments.body:
Yup, especially on Command blocks, i like the UI of Java Edition so i think that can change the UI (maybe just for Win 10 Edition) of MCPE Command block UI to Java UI.

the rest of UI I don't dislike it, maybe the creative inventory change like Java vr has.
I can't agree more.
Can this be done on xbox
Can this be done on xbox
Can this be done on xbox
NO the invintory is sooo confusing on java

And improve the menus in general, so clunky and unresponsive compared to java or literally any other game (on all devices). The pe style looks so tacky and cheap anyway it should be made closer to java
Many people can't play minecraft bedrock in their native language.
The Esperanto translation is really good, it's a shame I can't use it on my phone
This setting already exists in the accessibility settings.
393954745712 , there is no setting like this on bedrock for pc in accessibility settings. We NEED this for bedrock!!!!

You should add 3 stages of crouching stage 1 normal crouch stage 2 crouch and being able to go under 1 by 1/2 places stage 3 crawling you can go into 1 by 1 spaces you can access these by holding the crouch button
With 1.19 adding Ancient Cities, a large structure you're expected to crouch in throughout the whole area, I think adding a Toggle Crouch feature is needed on PC Bedrock.
It's a huge oversight that toggle crouch dosen't exiest on PC Bedrock.
Please add toggle crouch to Bedrock!

seriously, constantly holding the crouch for precarious ledges or the deep dark becomes genuinely physically painful after awhile. The fact you can toggle shift in Java and other control methods on bedrock but not pc is so annoying. People shouldn't have to find work arounds to mimic a feature that's already in the game simply because they over looked a necessary accessibility feature for keyboards.

yes i agree.i want play vr minecraft on my phone i have phone,controller and a vr cardboard.i think the vr should be cheaper,Even if this function has to be paid,i think it is better than to buy a oculus quest

YES, PLEASE =D

A bit like Skyrim VR and Elite Dangerous.

this would be a great update for mobile users and it makes players more focused on the game itself. if this does not get an update I think "Minecraft pe" would still be the same but having a new update for its own system itself would make "old players" come back playing again on their phones. like normal people they just bought and forget that they have Minecraft on their playing store. having "VR" on pe itself would make me play again also.
Yeah I Want this to be updated it is Easy to use controllers
It will be good
Yeah and you could use the built-in controller support for the controls!
It would be good to see it come to Google cardboard
I think it should be added tooðŸ’¯%
Pls add this
We need this as soon as possible
I need this to be able to play. This is an accessibility issue.
This is so important because it's harder to play PvP on controller hopefully this gets fixed its annoying
This is literally making MC on Android unusable. Would be easy to accomplish great gameplay like on pc but apparently they aren't interested

I suggest adding a team option like:

team modify <team> highlightSpectators (true|false)

where it defaults to true and will act exactly like currently. Setting it to false would make players in spectator mode in that team look exactly like if they were in survival mode or creative mode.
How about a gamerule instead?
The glowing part may be too OP? but the turning grey part is really nice.
How is it OP to not have to build a half flooded quarry around every treasure chest you find
Making the chest turn grey is a wonderful idea.

Perhaps just do the glowing effect when you're within a certain radius (Horizontal radius, not taking vertical distance from the chest into account). This way, it isn't OP, and you won't have to dig a half-flooded quarry.
that would be much better because in my experience it takes me 30-60 min to find 1 treasure chest or maybe the map could have the coordinates of the treasure.

When I play servival you can easily put on any cheating and continue the game with creative. that is ruining the game so much because it is so easy to cheat you should have a cheats off slot just like there is to change the difficulty stray. This glitch ruined the game for me and many others
Agree. Really want that option to get removed to, especially in Hardcore mode. Just to not have the temptation of using it.

I agree, I hate how easy it is to cheat. And then there's no way of verifying whether someone has cheated or not, and there's no punishment (such as not being able to unlock advancements or something) either. I just want to play survival without the temptation to cheat.

Hello Minecraft creators, hardcore is a game in java edition where everything you do feels like you have meaning as you can't die once and I would argue is the best game mode of Minecraft. However, I've discovered how easily you can cheat in the game and the worst part is that even if you do, you will receive achievements. By having this option it removes the whole purpose of the game and its just disappointing. I have two recommendations and one is that when you open LAN for your friend to join the option of creative should be removed as well as cheats. This means that the only options of LAN World will be survival (hardcore), adventure, spectate, port number, start LAN World and cancel. Also after the other person dies they should only have the option to spectate and quit to title. For the owner of the world when death it should give the options to press spectate, survival(hardcore), adventure, creative and cheats since statistics show the number of deaths you have in the world and won't make it as legit or trustworthy.

The second option will be that whenever you press LAN World Settings for Other Players and click on allow cheats or creative it stops giving you achievements similar to what bedrock has when changing survival to creative. 

Lastly, what's the point of playing hardcore when you can get everything you need by pressing LAN and changing its game mode to creative. I will show everyone how to take advantage of these options unless its fixed. Thanks! -darkfortune
strongly agree
it would very helpful if the in game skin chooser was accessible to game transcrion in beta 1.11.9 it is not accessible.
I would make it like resource pack choosing.
It would be good if there was a option in the menu for changing the skin.
A thing like that exists but only on bedrock. So I'd love to see it on the Java version of the game too.
This is very much needed
I can confirm that we should have ability to change skin while in the game so this makes it much easier for us instead of restarting the game
As a Minecraft role-player, this is an absolute necessity. It should be easy to switch between select skins like the resource pack selection menu. Please!!!
You should also be able to change you cape in game
Add this is counter in debug menu/F3 under day counter.
Yes, not sure if it is available in java but I definitely want this for Bedrock.
could this be just the entire f3 debug menu in java?

As we have a number of helpful links for the community, please familiarize yourself with the following resources:

Making Great Searches: https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360035667771-Making-Great-Searches-on-the-Feedback-Site-

Posting Guidelines: https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360003401232-Posting-Guidelines

Creating Great Ideas: https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360004442111-Creating-Great-Ideas

Previously Considered Feedback:  http://aka.ms/mcpcs

It appears there is either already an existing thread on this topic (or something very similar), it's a list of items/mobs/unrelated ideas, contains a previously rejected idea, or it is too general and is being rejected by our team for posting.  Be sure to join existing threads in progress, even if your idea isn't an exact match - we read ALL the comments. Thanks.
æˆ‘æˆ‘æˆ‘

I too would like this feature to become a reality as playing pvp maps with friends makes it hard to play as you know where each other is at all times due to gamer tags and maps. So the ability to turn off all gamer tags for all players, including the markers on the maps would be great!
Please make it so you can turn off nametags for minecraft bedrock. Thank you!

I second the heck out of this. I have tourettes so I happen to press many buttons repeatedly all the time. I only ever play in creative to test out redstone ideas so I always have the same components on my hotbar and it's getting really annoying to replace them.

My 5 year old loves Minecraft to death, and creative is his favorite mode, and we have been hitting this a lot too.

He has now on about a half dozen or more occasions (that I witnessed at least) accidentally cleared his hotbar while in this menu in creative mode, and this last time he totally melted down and called the game the worstest and started sobbing uncontrollably. Minecraft is definitely his favorite game right now, so to get him to swing that hard on it I think shows how brutal this can be on a kiddo.

Also both my wife and I have also accidentally cleared his hotbar with trying to help him, so I don't think it's limited to just kids. I would also love to totally unbind that hotbar clear option in creative as Joel suggested.

Minecraft is my sons favorite game but heâ€™s almost 6 and still not a great reader. He loves playing in creative and is turning out to be quite the builder. It takes a long time for him to find all the items he needs for his builds because he canâ€™t read yet. On many occasions, we have accidentally wiped his bar while trying to help him but itâ€™s the worst when he does it to himself or loses a map which can never be recovered. Yesterday, he was deep into building and cleared his bar by accident. He cried so hard, he wanted to delete the game and just lay with me whimpering for a long time. We just wish we could clear the binding at the least but even clearing the Y bind doesnâ€™t do it. This seems to only to be an issue on Switch in creative mode.

I agree with this. There have been times where I have thought I selected an item e.g. a stack of coal and I want to say take 10 coal from that stack but I haven't selected it and instead of pressing X to take one I press X and it clears my hotbar so an option to toggle this would be great.

YES! PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE
add something to help us avoid losing so much time due to this "clear hotbar" button.
It is very easy to do, and there is not even a confirmation warning, which would be absolutely great. It would also be easy to do, just a simple "are you sure?"
I wanted to put four maps on the wall using item frames in order to make a big map on the wall. I flew around filling up the maps which took hours, only to have them wiped with a single button press. This just doesn't make any sense, it shouldn't be that easy to lose hours of work. Another way around this would be to add a way to "favorite" items in your inventory or hotbar, which locks them in your inventory and prevents favorited items from being dropped or cleared.
It is very frustrating to have spent time doing something and having it undone in 1 second. No "undo" button. No trash bin where you can find recently deleted items. NOTHING.
Possibly the worst thing about this, is the choice of button, above all! (On ps4) Square is what we use to enter the crafting menu, its a very common button to push while in creative mode especially. There have been times where I lost an entire hotbar of tools and armor which were each enchanted a few times. Takes a very long time gathering all the enchanted books i will need. Putting each item through an anvil with each book. One wrong button press and all gone. I absolutely hate the feature, and I cannot think of a single time it was useful!

Why did you guys vote for this. now that they have done it, I can't clear my hot bar at all. I have to individually go and remove items which takes so much longer and it's so annoying. Please add it back Mojang
Hi! Marking this as "released" now. For those who are having trouble removing items from the hotbar, you can clear it by heading to Minecraft > Settings > Controller > Clear Hotbar.
Screenshot the world from what angle?

This is the idea I also had! The angle is like, the 0,0 coordinate, which was a corner in indev when the feature was in use.

Here's an example. It works best with limited worlds, which are a separate idea, but still.... I want these screenshots back. They were very glitchy though.
Omg yes. Why was it taken out? That makes no sense.

It was taken out as it took a screenshot of the whole world and it would take a lot of reworking for the new (basically) infinite world generation. Although it is possible if the center was the player's cords instead of 0, 0 and it screenshoted the chunks in your render distance instead of the whole world. I think there was a mod that did this called mineshot but it hasn't be updated since 1.8.

It was removed when the Infdev came in.
Do you know how could the image look with an infinite world? I was able to obtain a screenshot of the Infinite world and it caused my PC to crash.

The image was larger than 10 Gigs. ðŸ˜± Even the editors back in 2010 there was no way to open that screenshot.

I still have the image, but its corrupted back in 2015 when I dropped my laptop on a floor and HDD almost died.

I have even tried to move the HDD platters into my another not working HDD and no success. ðŸ˜¢

There are some mods like DynMap and more like Mineshot that can do this feature too.

Mineshot wasnt updated since 1.9 came out. But there was one guy who edited the Mineshot to work with early 1.9 versions
Yeah. I think it should be based on the chunks rendered around you, that way you could take ones of particular points of interest like your base.
Yeah its a super cool feature! Lets just hope that if it were ever to be readded that the bedrock version doesnt screw it up bc of parity.
you are absolutely right
So sad such a cool thing has been removed.
Can it not do that? I thought it could.
Good
This could also be solved by having two kinds of beds.  One is a bed that sets your spawn, the other is a sleeping bag, useful for sleeping the night away, but does not set your spawn.

Good idea. I think when you first sleep in a bed, you should automatically have the spawn set, and then any subsequent beds you sleep in will have the option available above the leave bed button saying "Set Spawn".

If the bed you currently have set as spawn is broken, you will automatically have the spawn set.
Nice idea but I completely agree that a sleeping bag block would be even better because it would be more user friendly and a sleeping bag would fit in well with the new campfire block.

I like the idea of a different item than a bed.  A sleeping bag?  A tent?  A lean-to?  Something to use while exploring.

 

But...  What I would like is for the re-spawn point to be left at the location of that item until it is destructed and picked back up.  That way, if you're out exploring and you're spending some time in one area, attempting to do some things and you die, you'll re-spawn right there where your sleeping bag/tent/lean-to is.  Once you pick that item up, your re-spawn point should revert back to the last bed you slept in.

So you could have a temporary re-spawn point, without losing your main re-spawn point at your base.

We desperately need a way to sleep without resetting our spawn point. This should be the simplest thing in the universe to code, Mojang really needs to pick up the slack and implement this quality of life feature asap.
Great idea
i need this the silence hurts more than the noise
I'm kind of surprised I can't find a mod which does this tbh. I swear the music on the x-box 360 version played a lot more often than it does on java.
i cant find this setting
man i hope this was real
Yes
perhaps the camera itself would be centered just to the side of the players head, then the crosshair could be bothe in the center of the screen and not on top of the player's head.
yes please, it used to be like that in beta, i hope they bring this back
Diffrent items
Ok
That's actually really smart.
sounds good to me, cleaner UI
Similarly, fire should not show up if you have fire resistance.
For once you've come up with an actually good idea! I fully support this (and the fire resistance idea too). Have a vote
This makes sense, why this isn't happening, I have no clue, Mojang please add to game.
Also the oxygen bar should go up and not stop
Yes, I just tested it and changed my skin to a random skin from the marketplace and my profile picture is now the face of that skin, but apparently it doesn't work with custom skins...

It would be OKAY if the profile picture matched the custom skin, and not just the skin from the marketplace.
But on the other hand, I could make my own profile picture with anything and anyone, not just the skin face.
PLEASE FIX.. AM NOT DEFAULT CHARACTER, ICON IS UNFORTUNATELY DEFAULT, AM USING CUSTOM SKIN!!
YES OMG, I HATE IT SO MUCH, I LOVED HAVING MY PFP AND SOME UGLY ALEX CHARACTER
Ä± agree

I was also using a custom skin. Before, my profile picture was a snapshot of my custom skin's face, but now it's a snapshot of Steve's face, and that's driving me crazy. However, I actually don't hate the new profile picture system, I think it looks a lot better for everyone. Please, at least make the profile picture match custom skins as well.

My pic has orange skin even tho it's white on the actual avatar.
That aside, this is also a potentially dangerous update for some players! I know 2 people who have been outed to their friends and family by the skin they were using bc of this update. I don't think players were even warned before hand
its so annoying how you cant have a custom skin be your profile picture. just make it be the xbox pic again
Someone has already reported this as a bug almost a year ago and it's currently being tracked here: https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MCPE/issues/MCPE-189765
yes I agree its annoying you cant tell who's who bc there are many people with the same name with only numbers to make a difference
Please make the icons like they used to be, or at least make it so that custom skins can be used as icons.

yea I agree. Its very hard to just simply play with your friends on Java.

You should get more votes.
yea I think so too
I sure hope they see this it's too much of a hassle and it's a shame considering how good a game minecraft is

Excellent idea me and my son were just saying this it's an issue that you can't play without playing you know and the ones you can are cheesy they glitch amd I'd like to be able to give. AAserveri.d to anyone I want to play wit hso it's easier

I agree but the whole pay money thing is a no-no. I think we should only pay to make them. I honestly feel like they should allow people to make a server for free as long as it limits to like 5 players and they limit one per person. Then after that they can charge extra for more ram/spaces/servers.

I agree, this issue needs way more votes. I feel like they should implement a system similar to Bedrock, where it is tightly integrated with your Xbox account, making it easy for your friends to find you. Or, they could make a separate system for Java only to keep your Xbox and Minecraft friends separate. Either way, I really hope this is a feature that gets added in the near future, as it seems Microsoft are favoring Bedrock as of right now with their Marketplace, Multiplayer, and Featured Servers.
Just have it set up the same way bedrock is with the friends tab in the menu.
THIS SHOULD BE REAL!!!
we need this so bad
I'm also with him
Yes, not everyone has WiFi. As for me I have high data plan which can support. But Minecraft is not supporting
This needs to be a option for ALL Minecraft bedrock versions. In my case windows 10 version.
It's outrageous, I have SIM card in my PC and cant play via internet directly?? WTF WTF
Fixed for PE. setings>profile>use cellular data.
Hardcore mod favorite Ã®n Minecraft
I agree with this completely, everything in this post. I think you can't just take the title from the main or original game and move it somewhere else.

This is because the bedrock edition is universal, it's what the developers intended the game to be, at this point in time the java edition is the odd one out. It's simply called Minecraft because it's what ALL platforms (Play Station aside) can use universally. It's called the java edition because that's what it runs, Java.    It may be many people's preferred version but so is bedrock edition. I feel that this would confuse things, "What version of Minecraft do you use?", "Minecraft", "Which one", "Minecraft.". Now with 'Minecraft' and 'Minecraft Java Edition', they are distinguishable.

 

Minecraft Bedrock is technically simply called 'Minecraft', no edition. It is universal, it unites all the consoles and PC's (Not Play Station though).
I completely agree with you. I can't choose which version to play.
There should be two minecrafts with one name ;)
No, because java edition is named that so people don't mix it up with bedrock, which runs on C++

The fact that Bedrock Edition doesn't have it while Java Edition does, feels horribly unfair. I get that Bedrock Edition is technically the more universal and popular version of the game but both deserve to be seen as equal. For me, it makes Java Edition feel like it was kicked to the side (even if it wasn't). The "Edition" title should be on both or none, and honestly I would prefer the ladder.

Considering the distinction of coding language used between Java and Bedrock, they should both state which edition on their title screens; Bedrock Edition needs the parity of having its part in the title and state so with "Minecraft".

reply to someone else.

 

"I feel that this would confuse things, "What version of Minecraft do you use?", "Minecraft", "Which one", "Minecraft.". Now with 'Minecraft' and 'Minecraft Java Edition', they are distinguishable."

 

then just add the bedrock edition title to bedrock edition. its not that difficult.
